text: Batter may mean: * Batter (baseball) * Batter (cooking) * Batter (cricket) * Batter (linuxoid) * To hit or strike a person, as in committing the crime of battery * To hit or strike a person, as in committing the tort of battery, a common-law offense * Slope * Batter head, on a drum, the head that is struck
title: Batter
